definitions.definition: ( law ) The part of or interest in a deceased husband's property provided to his widow , usually in the form of a life estate .
( law ) Property given by a groom directly to his bride at or before their wedding in order to legitimize the marriage ; dowry .
( obsolete ) That with which one is gifted or endowed; endowment; gift.

main_definition: ( law ) The part of or interest in a deceased husband's property provided to his widow , usually in the form of a life estate .
